org.interledger.psk

クラス PskCryptoUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.interledger.psk.PskCryptoUtils

  • public class PskCryptoUtils
extends Object
    Convenience methods for encrypting and decrypting PSK messages.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • encryptPskData

        public static PskCryptoUtils.AesGcmEncryptResult encryptPskData(SecretKey key,
                                                                byte[] nonce,
                                                                byte[] data)
        Encrypts a block of data using the encryption scheme specific in the PSK RFC and returns the encrypted data and the authentication.

        NOTE: May throw an InvalidKeyException if the Java Cryptography Extension (JCE) Unlimited Strength Jurisdiction Policy Files are not installed.

        @see http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jce8-download-2133166.html

        パラメータ:
        key - The AES encryption key.
        nonce - The 16 byte nonce to use as an IV.
        data - The data to encrypt.
        戻り値:
        The encrypted data and its accompanying GCM authentication tag.
        例外:
        RuntimeException - if there is an error encrypting the data

      • decryptPskData

        public static byte[] decryptPskData(SecretKey key,
                                    byte[] authTag,
                                    byte[] nonce,
                                    byte[] encryptedData)
        Decrypts an encrypted data block of a PSK message, according to the rules in the PSK RFC.
        パラメータ:
        key - The AES encryption key.
        authTag - The 16 byte auth tag to verify.
        nonce - The 16 byte nonce to use as an IV.
        encryptedData - The data to decrypt.
        戻り値:
        The decrypted data.
